materials.raw_text:
1. P (Phosphorus) - 100 g
2. S (Sulfur) - 30 g
3. Tb (Terbium) - 20 g
4. Y (Yttrium) - 10 g

sourcing.instructions:
1. Phosphorus - Chemical supply stores or online chemical suppliers.
2. Sulfur - Local gardening stores or chemical supply stores.
3. Terbium - Specialty metal suppliers or online rare earth element suppliers.
4. Yttrium - Specialty metal suppliers or online rare earth element suppliers.

preparation.raw_text:
1. Start with clean, dry mixing equipment.
2. Weigh each chemical using an analytical balance.
3. In a clean glass or ceramic container, combine 100 g of phosphorus and 30 g of sulfur.
4. Stir the mixture gently until homogenous.
5. Gradually add 20 g of terbium, mixing thoroughly to ensure even distribution.
6. Finally, incorporate 10 g of yttrium, continuing to mix until uniform.
